body: Cave Maps        Section from the park map of Crystal Cave. NPS Graphic       Crystal Cave and Bear Den, Canyon Wren, and Dusty Breakdown caves: plan view, showing passages as polygons colored to illustrate relative elevations (296 KB, JPEG format). Soldier's Cave: plan view, showing passages as polygons colored to illustrate relative elevations (66 KB, JPEG format).
title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Cave Maps
